name: LeadResponder
oneLiner: Auto-respond to new leads and log to CRM.
description: Automatically respond to new leads from web forms, emails, and other channels. Intelligently categorizes leads, sends personalized responses, and logs all interactions to your CRM system.

name: WhatsApp Support Bot
oneLiner: Answer FAQs and escalate tickets from WhatsApp.
description: Intelligent WhatsApp chatbot that handles customer inquiries, answers frequently asked questions, and seamlessly escalates complex issues to human agents.

name: RAG Knowledge Base
oneLiner: Private docs → vector search answers with citations.
description: Transform your private documents into an intelligent knowledge base using RAG technology. Provides accurate answers with source citations from your internal documentation.

name: Cold Email Sequencer
description: Automated cold email outreach system with intelligent personalization, multi-step sequences, and comprehensive UTM tracking for campaign performance analysis.

name: Content Calendar
oneLiner: Plan multi-channel posts with AI captions.
description: AI-powered content calendar that plans, schedules, and generates captions for multi-channel social media posts. Maintains brand voice consistency across platforms.

name: Sheet Scraper → Enrich
oneLiner: Scrape URLs, enrich contacts, push to Sheets.
description: Automated web scraping and data enrichment agent that extracts contact information from URLs, enriches the data with additional details, and populates Google Sheets.

name: Inventory Monitor
oneLiner: Track stock levels and auto-reorder supplies.
description: Intelligent inventory management system that monitors stock levels across multiple locations, predicts demand, and automatically triggers reorder processes when thresholds are met.

name: Review Responder
oneLiner: Auto-respond to reviews with brand voice.
description: Automated review management agent that monitors review platforms, generates brand-appropriate responses, and escalates negative reviews for manual handling.

name: Meeting Scheduler
oneLiner: Coordinate meetings via email with calendar sync.
description: Intelligent meeting coordination agent that handles scheduling requests via email, checks calendar availability, sends meeting invites, and manages rescheduling requests automatically.

name: Expense Tracker
description: Automated expense management system that processes receipt images, extracts relevant data, categorizes expenses, and integrates with accounting software for seamless bookkeeping.

name: Competitor Monitor
oneLiner: Track competitor prices and send alerts.
description: Comprehensive competitive intelligence agent that monitors competitor websites, tracks pricing changes, analyzes product updates, and sends timely alerts for strategic decision making.

name: Onboarding Flow
oneLiner: Guide new users through product setup.
description: Intelligent user onboarding system that personalizes the setup experience, sends timely nudges, tracks completion rates, and provides contextual help throughout the journey.
